profiles.name: Thousand Sons Sorcerer In Terminator Armour

datasheet.name: Empyric Guidance (Psychic)
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Marked by Fate (Psychic)
datasheet.description:
In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this model. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly THOUSAND SONS model makes an attack that targets that unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||
000001019|1|000008344||||Core|6"

units.name: Thousand Sons Cultists
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Cultist firearm; brutal assault weapon.

datasheet.name: Pawns of Fate
datasheet.description: Each time this unit destroys an enemy unit, roll one D6: on a 2+, you gain 1CP. When this unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 2+, you gain 1CP.

units.name: Rubric Marines
units.loadout: The Aspiring Sorcerer is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Warpsmite; force weapon. Every Rubric Marine is equipped with: inferno boltgun; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Bringers of Change
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Icon of Flame
datasheet.description: Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes a ranged attack, if a Critical Wound is scored, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.|Wargear||

units.name: Thousand Sons Helbrute
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: missile launcher; multi-melta; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Arcane Knowledge Amidst Babbling Insanity (Aura)
datasheet.description:
Each time a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model within 9" of this model is selected to use a Ritual, you gain 1 Cabal point.|Datasheet||
000001021|3|||Helbrute Fists|If this model is equipped with two Helbrute fists, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.|Datasheet||
000001022|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001022|2|000008334||||Core|2|
000001022|3|||Self Repair|At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.|Datasheet||
000001023|1|000008338||||Core|5+|
000001023|2|||Regenerating Monstrosities|At the start of each player’s Command phase, one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.|Datasheet||
000001024|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001024|2|000008342||||Core||
000001024|3|||Flame-wreathed|Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.|Datasheet||
000001025|1|000008339||||Core|D6|
000001025|2|||Assault Ramp|Each time a unit disembarks from this Transport after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||
000001026|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001026|2|||Destructor|Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an INFANTRY unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.|Datasheet||
000001027|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001027|2|||Siege Shield|When making ranged attacks with its demolisher cannon, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.|Datasheet||
000001028|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001028|2|||Blazing Salvoes|In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.|Datasheet||
000001029|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001029|2|||Prophetic Hunters|You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.|Datasheet||
000001030|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001030|2|||Scuttling Walker|Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Unearthly Power
datasheet.description: At the start of the battle round, select one of the abilities in the Crimson King section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has that ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Lord of the Planet of the Sorcerers (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a Psychic Attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000001031|6|||SUPREME COMMANDER|If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||
000001031|7|||Impossible Form (Psychic)|Each time an attack is made against this PSYKER (excluding Psychic Attacks), subtract 1 from that attack’s Damage characteristic.|Primarch||
000001031|8|||Treason of Tzeentch (Psychic)|At the start of your opponent’s Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to this PSYKER. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.|Primarch||

datasheet.name: Time Flux (Aura, Psychic)
datasheet.description: While a friendly THOUSAND SONS unit is within 6" of this PSYKER, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.|Primarch||

units.name: Ahriman
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Psychic Stalk; Black Staff of Ahriman.

datasheet.name: Rubric Lord
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Arch-Sorcerer of Tzeentch (Psychic)
datasheet.description: Once per battle, you can select this model to use a Ritual for 0 Cabal points. If you do, all the other rules for using Rituals still apply.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: AHRIMAN
datasheet.description: Your army cannot contain both AHRIMAN and AHRIMAN ON DISC OF TZEENTCH.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Exalted Sorcerer
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Astral Blast; inferno bolt pistol; force weapon.

datasheet.name: Arcane Shield (Psychic)
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Rebind Rubricae (Psychic)
datasheet.description: In your Command phase, if this model is leading a unit, you can roll one D6: on a 1, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit; on a 6, you can return up to 2 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.|Datasheet||

units.name: Tzaangors
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Tzaangor blades.

datasheet.name: Herd Banner
datasheet.description: You can re-roll Battle-shock tests taken for the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Brayhorn
datasheet.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Relic Hunters
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6 for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it: for each 4+, you gain 1 Cabal point.|Datasheet||

units.name: Scarab Occult Terminators
units.loadout: The Scarab Occult Sorcerer is equipped with: inferno combi-bolter; Warpsmite; force weapon. Every Scarab Occult Terminator is equipped with: inferno combi-bolter; Prosperine khopesh.

datasheet.name: Implacable Guardians
datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more PSYKER models, each time an attack is made against this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than this unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Thousand Sons Daemon Prince
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

datasheet.name: The Weave of Fate (Psychic)
datasheet.description:
Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly RUBRIC MARINES or SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit within 6" of this model. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [PRECISION] ability.|Datasheet||
000001036|4|||Glamour of Tzeentch (Aura, Psychic)|While a friendly THOUSAND SONS unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Immaterial Flare (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit uses a Ritual that specifies a range, you can double that range while resolving that Ritual.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Termite Assault
datasheet.description:
This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.|Datasheet||

000003604|4|||Termite Assault|This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Even In Death I Serve
datasheet.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.|Datasheet||

datasheet.description:
Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit more than 12" from the bearer, an unmodified successful Hit roll of 4+ scores a Critical Hit.|Wargear profile||
